name: 陳柏端
objective:
本課程為一門「總整課程」(Capstone course)，由 2-4 位學生組成。與指導教授討論及擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的指導下進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成專題報告。包括培養以下四種能力：1. 整合 (integration)，2. 收尾 (closure)，3. 反思 (reflection)，4. 過渡 (transition)。
This course is a "Capstone course" consisting of 2-4 students. Discuss and formulate the topic of topic research with the guidance professor, conduct experimental research under the guidance of the professor, and write the research results into a special report. Including the cultivation of the following four abilities: 1. integration, 2. closure, 3. reflection, and 4. transition.

10-18 週，進行實驗

name: 黃秀英
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下，進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。每一學期修完時如欲換題目時需等老師將該學期成績打出後再徵求原來及新老師都同意才可更換題目。
課程介紹領域整合應用，含括「總整課程」(Capstone course)，由 5 位學生組成。與指導教授討論及擬定 USR 專題研究活動內涵，團隊合作進行實作，參與文教電動車 USR 計畫，並將結果寫成專題報告。
培養學生：1. 整合 (integration)，2. 收尾 (closure)，3. 反思 (reflection)，4. 過渡 (transition) 等能力。
這學期課程結合 USR 大學社會責任於專題課程中，引導學生應用所學於 USR 之規劃設計，期望學生在參與 USR 計畫中，應用車輛相關專業能力，提出方案與活動建議。
The course focuses on integration and applications and encourage students to engage in USR activities. Students will pay visits to different local society, and to propose the project/activity to fit the local needs. At the end of semester, report should be complete about the whole USR project. Through the course, students can learn 4 major capability: (1) Integration; (2) Closure; (3) Reflection; (4) Transition.
In this semester, University Social Responsibility (USR) concept is brought into the class. Encourage student to participate the USR project. By planning and designing the USR program/activities, students can apply their vehicle-related professional abilities in the USR program.
